es-AR-I allow Philips to store my data in cloud
es-AR-Giving this consent you are allowing Philips to store information related to you
es-AR-I allow Philips to use my data for Coaching purposes
es-AR-Giving this consent you are allowing Philips to process information related to you
es-AR-I allow Philips to store binary data
es-AR-Giving this consent you are allowing Philips to store information related to you
es-AR-I allow Philips to use my mobile application usage statistics
es-AR-Giving this consent you are allowing Philips to process mobile usage statistics related to you
es-AR-I allow Philips to use my data for Research and Analytics purposes

es-AR-As a result of your consent, Philips group companies may contact you with promotional communications via email, SMS and other digital channels, such as mobile apps and social media. To be able to tailor the communications to your preferences and behavior and provide you with the best, personalized experience, we may analyze and combine your personal data. This data may include: 

Data you give us
Data that you want to actively share with us such as: your name, date of birth or age, email address, physical address, country, gender, phone number, social media profile.

Data we get from your interactions with Philips
Data about your interactions and usage of the Philips digital channels, such as social media, websites, emails, apps and connected products. This data may include: IP address, cookies, device information, communications you click on, location details, and websites you visit

Philips will give you the opportunity to withdraw your consent at any time.
For more information, please read the Philips Privacy notice and the Philips Cookie notice.
